commits.message: Add dual payment gateway (Dodo + LemonSqueezy) and fake door validation
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Archive and delete duplicate Coming Late Squad from Vapi
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Archive and delete 15 old single-assistant scenarios from Vapi
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Add orphaned assistants to Vapi archive and delete from account
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Add backup of 6 deleted legacy Vapi assistants
commits.author: shalombook

panels.title: Add dual payment gateway
panels.scene: Two giant golden gates, 'Dodo' and 'LemonSqueezy', stand at the entrance to the kingdom. Villagers are throwing money at both. A small, flimsy door labeled 'FAKE' stands slightly ajar next to them. Knight is facepalming.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Two ways to pay! Our riches shall flow freely!

panels.title: Archive Coming Late Squad
panels.scene: A group of villagers, all wearing comical oversized clocks around their necks, are being herded into a giant archive box by the knight. The villagers are crying dramatically.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Noooo! Not the Coming Late Squad!

panels.title: Delete 15 single-assistant scenarios
panels.scene: Knight casually throws fifteen tiny stages off a cliff. Each stage has a single miniature villager acting out a scene. The cliff overlooks a chasm of code.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Fifteen plays, gone forever! The drama!

panels.title: 5 commits. 29 scenarios archived. 2 payment methods.
panels.scene: The knight sits on a crate labeled 'Vapi Archives'. Villagers are carving a statue of the knight deleting code. One villager is presenting the knight with a small, dusty clock.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: We will always remember the Coming Late Squad...
